mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_schedule (start_date, end_date, position, content, user_id) values (#{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{position}, #{content}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.position, s.content, s.user_id, (SELECT name FROM user WHERE id = s.user_id) AS userName FROM user_schedule AS s WHERE s.user_id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS start, DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS end, s.position, s.content, s.user_id, (SELECT name FROM user WHERE id = s.user_id) AS userName FROM user_schedule AS s WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_schedule SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, position = #{position}, content = #{content}, user_id = #{userId} WHERE id = #{id}
